EmailTemplate.description: ATR BGA Terms and Conditions Magic Language 2
EmailTemplate.name: Battle of the Forms Magic Language 2
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
You have rejected our previous offer.
Seller’s commencement of performance, shipment, and/or delivery shall be for Buyer’s convenience only and shall not create any contract obligation nor shall it be deemed or construed to be acceptance of Buyer’s terms and conditions, or any of them. Buyer’s acceptance of any product or service furnished hereunder shall be deemed assent to and acceptance of all the Honeywell terms and conditions stated herein, and excluding any and all other terms and conditions.
If you have any questions or wish to respond or object, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
